channel.title: Donator Box. [PI]
channel.description: Okay, So in my server I get donations (Like any other server). But anyway, I want to make a new donation item, a donation box. I want it to be like, when they click it, it will give them 3-5 random items. I'm not sure what file or what code to code this in. So if you could please help me out that would be great. Rep++ if you help me correctly.

item.title: Donator Box. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“DcnScape, post:3, topic:372304”]public static int randomItems[] = {item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, item6, etc};

Is the “item1, item2, item3, item4, item 5, item6, etc” really suppose to be there? or should I add the items?[/quote]
add the item IDs for example: “item1” would be 1050, just find the item IDs you want to be given out and replace the “Items” with the IDs

Read full topic
